channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CFPB Calls for Limits, $120 Million Fine Against Navient for Student Loan Practices
item.description: The regulator’s proposed order could permanently ban Navient from servicing federal direct loans.

item.title: Events.com Secures Upsized $200 Million Share Subscription Facility from Global Emerging Markets (GEM) to Fuel Market Expansion
The Brawl Taking Shape Over Pfizer's Multibillion-Dollar Heart Monopoly
item.description: The drugmaker’s fastest-growing blockbuster could soon face competition from two biotech firms in the treatment of a little-known heart condition.

item.title: RateMyAgent Launches Price Expert Badge To Highlight Top-Performing Agents
Falling Interest Rates May Be a Challenge for JPMorgan but Not for Everyone
item.description: Some banks may still see rising net interest income even if the Federal Reserve slashes rates as anticipated.

item.title: Orveda, the French multi-award-winning biotech skincare brand, unveils LA MAISON ORVEDA NEW YORK CITY, a wellness sanctuary dedicated to glow and skin longevity, located in the heart of the Upper East
Megamerger of European Banks Still Wouldn't Challenge Wall Street
item.description: A potential combination of Italy’s UniCredit with Germany’s Commerzbank would be big, but not big enough to create a European banking champion.

item.title: Masimo's Lawsuit Forced Politan and Quentin Koffey to Issue Corrective Disclosures on False and Misleading Statements Made to Masimo Stockholders on Issues Material to the Proxy Contest
Investors Adopt Defensive Crouch Ahead of Fed Rate Cut
item.description: The utilities sector is neck and neck with tech as 2024’s best performing group.

item.title: FTSE 100 hits one-week high as US rate cut expectations boost sentiment
